mapper.insert: insert into board(title, contents, hit, reg_date, g_no, o_no, depth, user_no) values(#{title }, #{contents }, 0, now(), (select ifnull(max(g_no), 0) + 1 from board as subquery), 1, 0, #{userNo })
mapper.update: update board set o_no = o_no + 1 where g_no = #{groupNo } and o_no >= #{orderNo }
mapper.insert: insert into board(title, contents, hit, reg_date, g_no, o_no, depth, user_no) values(#{title }, #{contents }, 0, now(), #{groupNo }, #{orderNo }, #{depth }, #{userNo })
mapper.select: select board.no, board.title, user.name as userName, board.hit, board.reg_date as regDate, user.no as userNo, board.depth from board inner join user on board.user_no = user.no order by g_no desc, o_no asc limit #{startIndex }, #{perPage }
select no, title, hit, reg_date as regDate, contents, user_no as UserNo, g_no as groupNo, o_no as orderNo, depth from board where no = #{no }
select no, title, hit, reg_date, contents, user_no, g_no, o_no, depth from board where no = #{boardNo } and user_no = #{userNo }
mapper.update: update board set title = #{title }, contents = #{contents }, reg_date = now() where no = #{no }
